title: Édith Piaf
summary: Édith Piaf (UK: /ˈpiːæf/, US: /piːˈɑːf/,[1] French: [edit pjaf] (listen); born Édith Giovanna Gassion, French: [edit dʒɔvana ɡasjɔ̃]; 19 December 1915 – 10 October 1963) was a French singer noted as France's national chanteuse and one of the country's most widely known international stars.[2]
